opendial.datastructs

Class SpeechStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • opendial.datastructs.SpeechStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Comparable<Value>, Value

    public class SpeechStream
extends java.io.InputStream
implements Value
    Representation of a input audio stream used to record speech.
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

      • SpeechStream

        public SpeechStream(javax.sound.sampled.Mixer.Info inputMixer)
             throws DialException
        Creates a new speech stream on a particular input audio mixer
        Parameters:
        inputMixer - the audio mixer to use
        Throws:
        DialException - if the stream could not be captured from the mixer

      • generateFile

        public void generateFile(java.io.File outputFile)
                  throws DialException
        Generates an audio file from the stream. The file must be a WAV file.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - the file in which to write the audio data
        Throws:
        DialException - if the audio could not be written onto the file
